rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a vestibule area; designed for natural lighting and Vastu-compliant entry.
Spacious Mediterranean-style living room with terracotta accents, large windows on the south-east to ensure proper sunlight and adherence to Vastu guidelines.
Compact yet efficient kitchen located in the north-east corner for positive energy flow according to Vastu principles. Features modern fixtures within a Mediterranean theme using local materials.
Small guest bathroom adjoining the kitchen area with essential facilities.

Dedicated home office positioned in a quiet corner of the ground floor near the living room for natural light but shielded from direct sunlight. Incorporates local materials and Mediterranean design elements.
Two-car garage designed with an efficient layout on the west side of the plot to align with natural ventilation and ease of access from the main entrance.
Functional staircase connecting ground floor to upper level, designed for safety and compliance with local building codes.

openings.location: North-facing entrance with emphasis on Vastu.

openings.description: Large window allowing ample natural light.

openings.location: Between Living Room and Home Office
